Posts.Content:
Our research team at Tulane University is conducting an online survey of individuals with cancer histories. We are particularly interested in individuals with a history of breast cancer.
If you have 10 minutes, please fill out this survey:
[url]www.tulanesurvey.com[//url]
The survey asks about
 people’s healthcare preferences, demographics, and health history. It also presents some recent research findings that may be relevant to patients. We hope that the study will build knowledge that can help individuals with cancer to be more satisfied with their care.
Thank you! If you have questions please reply to this post.
(Thank you, Mr. Peter Waite, for allowing me to post a link to our study.)[url]
Posts.Title: Please Help with Our Research!!

Posts.Content:
We are just following up to say thank you! 
Our survey is closing in 4-6 weeks and we were happy to get so many volunteers. If you or somebody you know is still interested in completing the survey, please feel free to do so. We very much appreciate your input!
Thanks again,
Katie
Posts.Title: Please Help with Our Research!!
